titles.title: Bridging the Tribal Digital Divide Act of 2020
Bridging the Tribal Digital Divide Act of 2020
Bridging the Tribal Digital Divide Act of 2020
To expedite and streamline the deployment of affordable broadband service on Tribal land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
